_comment: Linux x86_64 build profile for GCC/Clang with CPU-only support
_description: This profile builds CloneClean for Linux x86_64 using Ninja and system GCC/Clang without GPU acceleration. Produces DEB, RPM, and TGZ packages.

targets.notes: Requires Ninja build system, Qt6 dev packages, and CPack dependencies (dpkg-deb, rpmbuild). Edit Qt6_DIR to match your Qt6 installation path.
